funFacts.fact: Living with 5 cats and 2 dogs — it’s basically a zoo, and I love it.
Currently studying Visual Design to blend creativity with clean UI work.
I get MVP ideas almost every night at 2am — thanks, brain.
I pick up a new hobby almost every month — crochet, painting, pottery, you name it.
If I like you enough, I’ll crochet a bandana for your pet.
If you ask nicely, I might show you my cat-themed 404 page.
